entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OutputCaching middleware memory leak #61800
  • Support discovering `TryParse` and `BindAsync` from extension members #61799
  • options.ClaimActions.Remove("given_name") not working #61797
  • Blazor Hot Reload not working [JSInvokableAttribute("ApplyHotReloadDeltas")] error #61796

Closed

  • Perf regression: mvc #61787
  • Unused TRoleClaim in Microsoft.Extensions.Identity.Stores.UserStore class #61763
  • ::deep pseudo-element does not work if child component is not wrapped into a 'super' tag by parent component #61750
  • BLAZOR - @bind-Value:after stopped working after update #61584
  • Reg Perfomance issue in Blazor #61660
  • Blazor Server Template Still Exists in .NET 8 — No Deprecation Warning, Confusing UX #61664
  • Latest .net 9 SDK breaks all of our .net 8 SDK projects #61661

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/10.0-preview4] Backport identity template fix. #61795
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61745
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview5
  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to 17.8.3 #61322
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61265
    area-commandlinetools, pending-ci-rerun
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #61780
    area-infrastructure
  • Add statically-typed support for wrapping JS interop calls as C# delegates #61721
    area-blazor
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #58587
    * NO MERGE *, 10.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Merge the dynamic change-tracking delegates into PropertyAccessors #31357
  • Msg 1035, Level 15, State 10, Line 303 Incorrect syntax near 'CAST', expected 'AS'. Msg 102, Level 15, State 1, Line 311 Incorrect syntax near 'c'. #36021

Updated

  • GroupJoin throws when applied on an anonymous return type output of another Linq #28248
    Backlog
  • New Provider: Upgrading efcore provider to efcore 8 results in UnexpectedTrailingResultSetWhenSaving #36023
  • Concurrency error in HandleTransactionCompleted (RelationalConnection) #35856
  • Using nested owned types causes InvalidOperationException #36015

PullRequests

Merged

  • Revert "Try BinSkim extract feature azure-pipelines.yml" #36035
  • Try BinSkim extract feature azure-pipelines.yml #36034
  • Remove get ef project metadata #36033
    community-contribution
  • Slightly improve performance and maintainability in SequentialGuidValueGenerator #35981

Updated

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35983 - Cosmos/FTS: update translation of FullTextScore to use multiple keywords rather than keyword array #36000
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.6
  • Named query filters #36028
  • Translate COALESCE as ISNULL in more cases #35986

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Converter must return a bool when binding IsVisible property #29338
  • Initial binding fails when binding to a collection of an interface #29337
  • BindableProperty for a BindingBase property doesn't trigger PropertyChanging or PropertyChanged #29336
  • OnIdiom<GridLength> throws an not implemented Exception (in GridLengthTypeConverter) #29334
  • [iOS] NavigationRenderer calls base PopViewController in some areas #29329
  • [Android] Button with shadow broken on Android device #29325
  • [iOS] - CollectionView V2 layout problem #29324
  • Enhance diagnostic experience for Maui #29319
  • [iOS] - CarouselView Position and IndicatorView Not Updating When Moving to Next Item in CV2 #29312
  • [iOS] - CarouselView Items Not Displaying in CV2 #29310
  • [iOS] - CarouselView Position Not Respected When Changing From Hidden to Visible in CV2 #29309
  • [iOS] - CarouselView Throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException Immediately on Application Launch in CV2 #29308

Closed

  • Maui webview .Navigated event is not triggered #23502
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Webview events fire different on iOS and Android #21800
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [MAUI] RefreshView C4 RefreshColor is not displayed correctly on Surface when refreshing. #16973
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Shell TitleColor changes not only the color of the title, but also the color of the secondary ToolbarItem's titles #20177
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] IndicatorView using templated icons not working #7144
    .NET 9 SR7
  • DatePicker default format on iOS #27803
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Support for latest renderer in Google Map #20740
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Square brackets in WebView URL Sources result in ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND on Android #23690
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Space character in Webview's Source causes net::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND error #23767
    .NET 9 SR7
  • WebView in .NET MAUI fails to load URL with "&" character on Android despite URL encoding #26843
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Shell does not always raise Navigating event on Windows #12500
    .NET 9 SR7
  • How to hide the password hint which is showing when the entry is focused #17105
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [regression/7.0.0] Back button image color can't be changed #17228
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Menu item is not disappear when switch on another tab #19831
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Maui Grouped CollectionView incorrect item highlighted #22320
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Date Format property in DatePicker not working on Windows with date Format #10805
    Backlog
  • [Android][DrawImage]Under Android, canvas. DrawImage is not displayed completely #13639
  • Using DataTemplate breaks ObservableCollection binding #15147
  • [Android] Crash updating the ItemSpacing at runtime #22187
  • [Android] TapGestureRecognizer on Border doesn't work when it has shadow applied #29169
    Backlog
  • Unit Testing MAUI .net9.0 version facing manifests issue #29162
  • About the issues that arise with the use of VS2022 .NET MAUI #29178
  • Latest Visual Studio 2022 Update Appears to Reintroduce MAUI Checkbox Margin issue, but now on Windows platform where before was Anddroid #29177
  • Key is not findable in ResourceDictionary MAUI 10 #29179
  • .NET Maui iOS app now crashes every time #29185
  • My .NET Maui project has an error when consuming an Web API #29183
  • ListView in Maui Swiches Caching Strategy still one Straategy is Expicit Defined #29186
  • Broker app #29155

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Button with corner radius shadow broken on Android device - fix #29339
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [2025/05/12] Candidate - In Flight Branch #29335
  • Android Libraries Ecosystem Updates 20250502 #29331
  • Make sure to use the override implementation of PopViewController on NavigationRenderer #29330
    community ✨
  • [tests] Add coreclr test for SF sample #29327
    area-testing
  • [.NET 10] Add "Open/Close" API to picker controls #29323
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-picker
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView ItemsSource Feature #29322
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Revert "Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit" #29321
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView proper bounce-back behavior when Loop=false #29318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for the FontImageSource color is not applied properly to the Bottom Tab Icon #29317
    p/0, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/android, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR8
  • Fix -[iOS] - CarouselView Throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException Immediately on Application Launch in CV2 #29316
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Update failing CarouselView2 tests to use CarouselView1 in sample #29315
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [NET10.0] Annotate converters for nullability 3/n #29314
    community ✨
  • Fix: Picker selects incorrect item after item removal #29313
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [GitHub] Update breaking change tag to PMs #29326
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS]Fix: FlyoutPage memory leak #28769
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR7
  • Re-enabled flaky UI test TextInEditorShouldScroll #29167
    area-testing, community ✨, testing-flakiness, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for CarouselView IsSwipeEnabled=False Prevents Visual Navigation #29286
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • [Android] Fixed Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29210
    p/0, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent Duplicate MapSource Invocations on setting Image's Source to Local File Paths #28405
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR8
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, .NET 9 SR8
  • Add the ability to intercept all web resource requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [2025/05/03] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [DO NOT MERGE][net10.0] 20250414 net10.0 ecosytem updates #28997
  • [iOS] Fix: ActivityIndicator IsRunning ignores IsVisible when set to true #28983
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #29166
    community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar Black Background Issue When Setting Transparent Background #29225
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for ImagePaint Not rendering in View #29205
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Incorrect Window.Y and Window.Height values when closing a maximized window #29253
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Flyout title is not broken over multiple lines when you rotate your screen. #29171
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Assigning null to the SelectedItem of the CollectionView in the SelectionChanged event does not clear the selection #29288
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Remove Compatibility.Layout as a subclass of all modern .NET MAUI controls #29281
    t/breaking 💥, area-layout, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Expose DispatcherExtensions so it could be used outside of Maui as well #29259
    community ✨
  • Fix for First Item in CollectionView Overlaps in FlyoutPage.Flyout on iOS #29265

  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView EmptyView display when filtering to zero items #29247

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion in nullability analysis of collection expression with extension `Add` method #78452
  • Multiple patterns inside parens don't format correctly #78449
    Backlog
  • `#defined` symbols do not get recommended if not defined in compilation options #78447
  • Codefix not loading from within VS, works in rider though #78445
  • Allow odering of source generators #78440
  • C# 14 extension methods don't compile when an interpolated string is inside a nested lambda #78435

Closed

  • IDE0022 for non-single line methods (comments) #78419
  • Incorrect nullability analysis for Deconstruct extension in positional pattern #78444

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid buffering and dispatching all ProducerConsumer items in one go in recent copilot helper. #78454
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move tests to NetLatest #78453
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Recommend `#define`d preprocessing symbols within a file #78451
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add a few tests for context provider service #78450
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix razor redirect #78448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • *** WIP: Targeted perf changes to CommandLineParser #78446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main into features/dictionary-expressions #78443
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Extensions: resolve some follow-up comments on signature conflicts and betterness #78442
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • *** WIP: Selectively persist the commandline to temporary storage #78441
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix unexpected conditional state in nullable analysis of conditional access #78439
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add WorkItem trait discoverer #78438
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection arguments: binding for interface target types #78436
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions

Merged

  • Extract out an interface for our LSP miscellaneous files workspace #78401
    Area-IDE, VSCode, Next
  • Move RestoreUseStaticGraphEvaluation setting inside repo #78429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Adjust LocalBinderFactory.VisitInvocationExpression to handle attributes on extension parameter #78399
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next
  • Exclude EditorFeatures from rebuild check #78437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Change `++`/`--` predefined operator names for instance operators #78434
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • File based programs IDE support #78208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not parse URIs during LSP serialization/deserialization #76691
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations during SourceGeneration #78403
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable analyzer doc validation in correctness runs #78420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support interpolated string handlers in extension blocks #78425
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make compiler detection more resilient #78402
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow shebang in project-based programs #78411
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Extensions: analyzer actions #78319
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix debugging of build tasks #78271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate usage of whole-archive in DAC #115316
  • [maui][hot-reload][vs] VS exits debug mode after changing C# code, applying Hot Reload and adding breakpoints afterwards #115307
  • Remove uses of `_PREFAST_` and `_PREFIX_` defines in VM #115305
    Future
  • [iOS][globalization][NativeAOT] CultureInfo.CurrentCulture does not include region code #115302
  • HttpClient async methods are blocking the first time #115301
  • [RISC-V] Need to configure target RISC-V extension for coreclr build #115296
  • Mono: NullabilityInfo.ReadState returns incorrect NullabilityState value #115295

Closed

  • [createdump] InitializeDAC: GetProcAddress(CLRDataCreateInstance) Failure #115245
    10.0.0
  • MemoryCache creates lots of tasks that cause CPU/Memory spikes on compaction in net8 LTS. #115142
  • [Bug][Linux][net8.0] Proxy CONNECT fails (407) using HTTPS_PROXY env var with credentials; No Proxy-Authorization header sent #114066
  • [mono][aot] aot compiler crash #115203
    10.0.0
  • System.Text.Json AOT Polymorphic serialization #115273
  • HashHelpers.GetPrime use Log2-based lookup #115266
  • SslStream RemoteCertificateValidationCallback has regressed to being unable to access protocol/cipher info #114351
    10.0.0
  • Duplicates in different config sources are treated differently #36557
  • Logging Scope filtering #36006

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert change to follow symlinks of dotnet host #115315
    area-Host
  • Target `netstandard2.1` where doing so is advantageous #115314
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Always respect WasmEnableSIMD when trimming #115313
    area-Build-mono
  • Revert "Switch libraries testing to Ubuntu 22 temporarily" #115312
    needs-area-label
  • Make the dotnet/runtime official build an assetless build #115311
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Initial draft of signed CMS for SLH-DSA #115310
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Handle not supported name constraints on Linux #115308
    area-System.Security
  • [Mono]: Fix generic interface non-virtual method vt_slot issue in build_imt_slots. #115306
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Optimize `emitLoadImmediate` further #115298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add APIs to `BlobBuilder` for customizing the underlying byte array et al. #115294
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix instance size emission in ILCompiler to handle indeterminate sizes #115293
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Use whole-archive to ensure DAC exports are preserved #115309
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: more bv-centric refactoring for escape analysis #115291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 136.0.7103.59, windows: 136.0.7103.49 #115276
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update DotNetBuild.props #115229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][aot] Reenable AOT System.Runtime.Intrinsics/tests and fix problems that exposed #115204
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use Span<T>-based methods in System.Net.Mail #115111
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm][aot] Fix op_OnesComplement on wasm and enable ceil/floor #115151
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Allow access to connection info in certificate validation callback #115186
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Defer RemoteCertificate assignment after X509 Chain build #114781
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Delete obsolete code in metadata #115292
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix source-build validation leg #115272
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Clean up stale debugger-related surface area in ThreadPool and Task{Scheduler} #115210
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Fix SLH-DSA key to use SHA-1 MAC for Windows support #115271
    area-System.Security
  • Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Consider instruction input size when considering embedded mask optimization #115074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2702500 #115228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [Perf] Add build time measurements for apple mobile and android scenarios #113469
    tenet-build-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline, 10.0.0
  • Remove ymm embedded rounding from AVX10.2 #115235
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Smaller funclet prologs/epilogs (x64) #115284
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Align SlhDsa API with MLKem #115290
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [mono][aot] optimize aot Unsafe.BitCast for more cases #115130
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Remove always searching executable directory for native libraries in single-file applications #115236
    breaking-change, area-Single-File, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacImpl.GetAssemblyList #114800
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #115256
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
    NO-MERGE
  • [APX] test some experiment changes on CI #114713
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115257
    area-codeflow
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataProcess.EnumMethodInstancesByAddress #115131
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Use AssemblyLoadContext-aware caches in TypeDescriptor to support unloading of assemblies cached by TypeDescriptor #114619
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Fix Metadata aggregator: removing cumulative sum for GUIDs heap offset #115268
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Add long/ulong->float cast helpers #114597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce string interpolation overhead #114497
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • EH support in the interpreter #115252
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Improve crossbuild inference #115247
    source-build, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Swallow CryptographicExceptions when adding certificates to store #115190
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono][metadata] Defer class init for T when initializing T[]. #115278
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Optimize comparisons #115039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove bundled FSharp.NET.Sdk #48818
  • DotnetCliSnapshotTests.VerifyCompletions failed in CI #48817

Closed

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Microsoft.IO.Redist versions #48819
    Area-CodeFlow
  • sln-add: --include-references when adding a project #48815
    Area-CLI
  • Ensure file-based program artifacts are restricted to the current user #48813
    Area-run-file
  • Fixup sln #48812

Merged

  • Implement auto-restarting on rude edit or no-effect change #48752
  • sln-add: Refactor logic for autogenerating solution folders #48726
    Area-CLI
  • Fix sdk.sln #48816

Updated

  • Upgrade Issue-Labeler to v2.0.0 #48796
  • [WIP] `dotnet tool exec <package[@version]>` one-shot execution #48443
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
